metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4335 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A blind SSRF vulnerability was identified in all versions of GitLab EE prior to 15.4.6, 15.5 prior to 15.5.5, and 15.6 prior to 15.6.1 which allows an attacker to connect to a local host.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Only affects Gitlab Enterprise Edition, not gitlab in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
